item.title: Ethereum Price Prediction: Popular Analysts Suggest Best Level To Buy ETH
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Ethereum (ETH) price has been moving in a sideways trend following the collapse of the crypto exchange FTX. While investors await for buying Ethereum from the bottom levels, crypto analysts believe $1,170 would be a good price to buy for the long term. Buy Ethereum Before You Miss the Bus Ethereum (ETH) price is currently

The post Ethereum Price Prediction: Popular Analysts Suggest Best Level To Buy ETH appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Ethereum (ETH) price has been moving in a sideways trend following the collapse of the crypto exchange FTX. While investors await for buying Ethereum from the bottom levels, crypto analysts believe $1,170 would be a good price to buy for the long term.

Buy Ethereum Before You Miss the Bus

Ethereum (ETH) price is currently trading above $1,200 and looks positive. Since November, the ETH price is bouncing off the $1,170 level, trying to rally over $1.3K. The most important thing to note here is that the ETH price is in upward momentum since November and holds above $1,200 mostly.

Crypto analyst Michael van de Poppe asserts the markets are in a bear market for 19 months already. Especially, altcoins have been crashing since May 21 despite the Solana (SOL) and Polygon (MATIC) cycle. He predicts that a first higher-low on higher time frames will be an indication of a relief run.

Michael van de Poppe also believes that $1,190 would be a good level for longs on Ethereum. For confirmation, await for the Ethereum price to drop to near the $1,170 support level and rebound over $1,200 again. However, despite the positive signs from the markets, indices as well as the U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) show weakness.

“Still, pretty much waiting for a scenario like this on ETH, in which we most likely retest before continue. Positive signs coming from the markets past few days, but no continuation as indices are showing weakness (while DXY shows the same).”

According to Michael van de Poppe, the ETH price can rally above $1,280 by the end of this year.

Crypto analyst Rekt Capital suggests that investors can buy Ethereum near $1,170 for the long term. Bitcoin price holding above $17,150 will be key for confirmation of an upcoming rally.

Also Read: Analyst Predicts Bitcoin (BTC), ETH, ADA, LINK Price For New Year 2023

Month-End Scenario For Ethereum (ETH) Price

Ethereum price currently trades at $1,216, up nearly 1% in the last 24 hours. Also, the 24-hour low and high are $1,206 and $1,224, respectively.

While the expectations of a Santa Claus rally are less this time, Ethereum price may rally to $1,280 near Christmas or near the New Year 2023.

Also Read: Terra Classic Validator ClassyCrypto Burns 13 Million LUNC

The post Ethereum Price Prediction: Popular Analysts Suggest Best Level To Buy ETH appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Target In Mid Term, Going Into 2023
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
While the year 2022 was forgettable for the crypto community, the macroeconomic scene is not in full favor going into 2023. However, the crypto community is hoping for a relief rally to provide respite in the ongoing bear market environment. Popular cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin (DOGE), which rose in exponential growth in 2021, lost all the

The post Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Target In Mid Term, Going Into 2023 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
While the year 2022 was forgettable for the crypto community, the macroeconomic scene is not in full favor going into 2023. However, the crypto community is hoping for a relief rally to provide respite in the ongoing bear market environment. Popular cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin (DOGE), which rose in exponential growth in 2021, lost all the value in the last one year. The memecoin did have an encouraging sign with Elon Musk taking over as Twitter chief.

Also Read: XRP Whales Holding Hits ATH Amid Pending Summary Judgment

Dogecoin DOGE Price Prediction 2023

The memecoin made a lot of progress in 2022 to be considered a mainstream cryptocurrency but not a ‘meme’ token as the name suggests. In fact, DOGE, along with other cryptocurrencies, is all set to be rolled out as a payment option for Google Cloud users some time in 2023. However, it remains to be seen how far would the rise in adoption propels the token price. Technical indicators point to the possibility of a decent price rise for DOGE in the mid term.

Crypto analysts, however, believe that the $1 price target is not within reach in the coming future. But, if the memecoin does hold support for 25 weekly moving average, there is a possibility of DOGE reaching $0.65 in the next few years, as per prediction of Anbessa Twitter account. As of writing, DOGE price stands at $0.07342, down 0.92% in the last 24 hours, according to price tracking platform CoinMarketCap.

$DOGE/USD #macro update

The #dumbmoney target of $1 is far away. Here is the #midterm potential if $DOGE holds 25MA WEEKLY support though. #macro stays bearish below macro channel upper trendline resistance + 99MA pic.twitter.com/EHNruszl1E

— AN₿ESSA (@Anbessa100) December 21, 2022

Also Read: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Filecoin Will Be Worth If FIL Reaches $10

Meanwhile, with the news of Elon Musk in the search for the new Twitter CEO, there could potentially be some price action for Dogecoin. In a latest clarification, Musk said he would still be leading the software and servers team even if he steps down. If Musk goes on to bring in a new CEO, it would be interesting to see how the new leadership plans to integrate crypto payments on the platform.

The post Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Target In Mid Term, Going Into 2023 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Top 3 Bitcoin YouTube Channels To Follow In 2023
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
YouTube is one of the most popular platforms for learning more about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. The news, reviews, analysis, and information about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are specifically dedicated to YouTube channels by content producers. You can make sure you stay up to date on the most recent bitcoin trends by following these channels. If

The post Top 3 Bitcoin YouTube Channels To Follow In 2023 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
YouTube is one of the most popular platforms for learning more about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. The news, reviews, analysis, and information about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are specifically dedicated to YouTube channels by content producers. You can make sure you stay up to date on the most recent bitcoin trends by following these channels.

If you are a Bitcoin trader, you should follow the top Bitcoin YouTube channels without a second thought. In order to make wise trading decisions and moves, you will learn a lot about Bitcoin and the market. And speaking of trading, one of the best trading platforms for CDFs, forex, stocks, and cryptocurrencies is Quantum AI trading.

 

Top 3 Bitcoin YouTube Channels to follow in 2023

Altcoin Daily

Altcoin Daily, founded by Aaron and Austin Arnold, has one of the largest crypto communities, with over 1.23 million subscribers. The fact that this channel consistently covered cryptocurrency news is one of the reasons it gained popularity.

Additionally, Altcoin Daily publishes some of the best market analyses, instructional videos, viewpoints, and opinions available. One of the top cryptocurrency channels on YouTube, Altcoin Daily occasionally features interviews with well-known members of the community.

Coin Bureau

Guy Turner founded Coin Bureau in 2019. Guy, the entrepreneur investor, and host behind the Coin Bureau cryptocurrency channel have amassed over two million subscribers on YouTube. Turner is a natural teacher who imparts knowledge of the sector. The videos on Coin Bureau cover the entire Web3 and digital asset industry, not just investing in cryptocurrencies.

This YouTube channel is a top pick for those interested in fundamental analysis of the cryptocurrency market and getting to know reliable sources for your own research. It goes beyond simply sharing personal opinions.

BitBoy Crypto

This YouTube channel is led by BitBoy Crypto, one of the most divisive crypto influencers out there. BitBoy Crypto, or Ben Armstrong, leads a loyal and engaged community of enthusiasts and investors on Crypto YouTube, with over 1.45 million subscribers.

There isn’t much BitBoy hasn’t covered in his videos. BitBoy Crypto keeps up with the latest trends in Bitcoin, crypto trading, and global regulations, as well as price predictions, news, and project reviews.

Conclusion

One of the best ways to ensure you’re informed about these topics is to subscribe to popular bitcoin and cryptocurrency YouTube channels.
Nevertheless, there are a lot of YouTube channels that pretend to be Bitcoin-related. The reason we identified the top 3 YouTube channels above is that understanding which to follow and which to ignore is crucial.

Also Read: Top 7 Crypto YouTubers To Follow in 2022

The post Top 3 Bitcoin YouTube Channels To Follow In 2023 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: XRP Whales Holding Hits ATH Amid Pending Summary Judgment
item.dc:creator: Ashish Kumar
item.description:
XRP News: The long running legal tussle between Ripple and U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is moving toward the much awaited Summary Judgment. The anticipation around the Ripple lawsuit ruling has driven the crypto whales to go on a heavy XRP accumulation spree. XRP whales on aggressive accumulation As per the data provided by

The post XRP Whales Holding Hits ATH Amid Pending Summary Judgment appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
XRP News: The long running legal tussle between Ripple and U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is moving toward the much awaited Summary Judgment. The anticipation around the Ripple lawsuit ruling has driven the crypto whales to go on a heavy XRP accumulation spree.

XRP whales on aggressive accumulation

As per the data provided by Santiment, Crypto whales and sharks are aggressively accumulating XRP tokens in the month of December 2022. It highlighted that the whale addresses that hold 1 million to 10 million XRP have hit the all time high (ATH).

Data depicts that there were just 1440 such whale addresses on November 1, 2022. While these addresses numbers have increased to stand at 1,617.

The percentage of supply of XRP held by these whales was recorded to be 6.33% on November 1, 2022. However, data shows that the percentage of supply held has reached 7.23% which is a new ATH.

Coingape reported that the crypto whales moved more than 675 million XRP on Monday, September 19. While around 500 million XRP were transacted by the whales on the day when the court partly rejected the SEC’s motion in the XRP lawsuit. Read more XRP news here

Why whales are adding Ripple’s native token?

XRP price is on a constant decline over the past weeks. Its price has dropped by 12% in the last 7 days. This price action has motivated whales to accumulate more XRPs.

However, crypto whales have managed to move 120 million XRP in the last 24 hours. WhaleAlert reported that a whale address bought $17.6 million worth of XRP from the Bitso crypto exchange. Meanwhile, whales have moved around 70 million XRP to crypto exchanges in order to dump them.

The post XRP Whales Holding Hits ATH Amid Pending Summary Judgment appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: LUNC News: Terra Classic Validator ClassyCrypto Burns 13 Million LUNC
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Terra Classic validator Classy’s Crypto Sphere has burned nearly 13 million LUNC tokens in a single transaction on Wednesday. The total number of LUNC tokens burned by the community has now reached over 36.231 billion. The Classy’s Crypto Sphere validator is associated with Terra Classic influencer ClassyCrypto. ClassyCrypto Contributes Terra Classic (LUNC) Burn Effort Terra

The post LUNC News: Terra Classic Validator ClassyCrypto Burns 13 Million LUNC appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Terra Classic validator Classy’s Crypto Sphere has burned nearly 13 million LUNC tokens in a single transaction on Wednesday. The total number of LUNC tokens burned by the community has now reached over 36.231 billion. The Classy’s Crypto Sphere validator is associated with Terra Classic influencer ClassyCrypto.

ClassyCrypto Contributes Terra Classic (LUNC) Burn Effort

Terra Classic influencer ClassyCrypto in a tweet on December 21 announced officially burning 100% of its LUNC validator commission. The burn included Classy’s Crypto Sphere validator commission of nearly 8 million LUNC tokens, ad revenue from LUNC videos on YouTube, and others.

ClassyCrypto said they have burned almost 13 million LUNC tokens after a 0.2% burn tax. He also shared the transaction details of sending LUNC to the burn address. It shows 12,787,487.63 LUNC tokens sent to the burn address, with 25,575 LUNC tokens as transaction fees.

“I also burnt all of the ad revenue our LUNC videos on YouTube have generated this month. Our LUNC focus is burning.”

Other Terra Classic community members thanked ClassyCrypto for doing was he promised and contributing to the burn effort of the community.

On Tuesday, ClassyCrypto tweeted that Classy’s Crypto Sphere validator is moving to a 100% commission-burned model. It will be “moving toward a 100% non-profit, 100% for the community model.” He revealed the plan to burn billions of LUNC tokens in 2023.

The Terra Classic community has burned over 36.231 billion LUNC tokens until now. Most of the burn is contributed by crypto exchange Binance, with over 20 billion LUNC tokens burned. Also, the community has burned over 11 billion LUNC tokens through burn tax.

LUNC Price Falls Amid Market-Wide Selloff

LUNC price currently trades at $0.00013, down 3% in the last 24 hours. The LUNC price saw massive selling amid selloffs seen in the broader crypto market. The 24-hour low and high are $0.0001295 and $0.0001354, respectively.

Terra Classic core developers Edward Kim and Zaradar quit Terra Rebels, putting the future of LUNC in question. However, it was later revealed that Edward Kim and Zaradar will work in a new team and continue contributing to the developments.

Also Read: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Terra Classic Will Be Worth If LUNC Reaches $1

The post LUNC News: Terra Classic Validator ClassyCrypto Burns 13 Million LUNC appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Media Organizations To Return Grants By SBF
item.dc:creator: Shourya Jha
item.description:
After the charges were filed by the justice department, the media companies that received money from the former FTX CEO, SBF, or his foundations, are freezing the cash. The business tycoon has been charged with fraud, money laundering, presenting a fake financial picture of his organization, and using customers’ money. He is facing extradition to

The post Media Organizations To Return Grants By SBF appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
After the charges were filed by the justice department, the media companies that received money from the former FTX CEO, SBF, or his foundations, are freezing the cash.

The business tycoon has been charged with fraud, money laundering, presenting a fake financial picture of his organization, and using customers’ money. He is facing extradition to the U.S.

The companies reconsidering SBF grants

ProPublica, a non-profit organization, on Tuesday, announced that they will be returning the 1.6 million USD that they got from SBF’s foundation, Building A Stronger Future. This money was supposed to be used for public health, biosecurity, and coronavirus. It was part of a 3-year grant of 5 million USD. The firm stated that it would find other ways for the fund. On the day, SBF stepped down as the head of FTX and filed for bankruptcy in the U.S. Court, ProPublica suspended all its grants. However, it is still unclear where this money will go.

Vox Media was given 200,000 USD by SBF’s family foundation and the company has also decided to return all the money. The spokeswoman for Vox told that they have already spent 14,000 USD for issues like climate change, fighting global poverty, and other challenges of society, in the month of August, For Vox as well it remains unclear how they will find a new funding partner or return the spent money.

Also read: FTX’s SBF Signs Extradition Paper, Will Fly to US on Wednesday

The news organization Intercept is reconsidering the grant of 500,000 USD that was given to them as a part of a 4 million USD grant. “At this time, we are still gathering the information we need to make a principled decision in accordance with our mission and values,” spokesman Rodrigo Brandao said on Tuesday. Earlier the company said that this has left a hole in their funding pocket.

The company Semafor accepted SBF’s grant in the month of May, this year with the hope that they would be able to carry independent journalism. However, they are reconsidering and waiting for the authorities to take a decision.

Also read: Amid FTX Contagion, Crypto Traders Now Face Another Massive Risk

When were these fundings made?

The funding, investments, and generous gifts made by SBF to newsrooms were part of a larger pattern that included roughly $40 million in political donations this cycle. This was large to Democratic-aligned groups. Before fraud allegations were made public and FTX was largely regarded as one of the more responsible businesses in the cryptocurrency market.

The post Media Organizations To Return Grants By SBF appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Year Ender: Top 3 Metaverse Trends To Watch In 2022
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
Metaverse is a collective virtual universe that combines virtual worlds, augmented reality, and the internet. The virtual universe, also known as the metaverse, is a vast digital space that experts believe will eventually replace the internet. People can buy property in this world, make NFT exhibits, sell the digital content they create, or play games

The post Year Ender: Top 3 Metaverse Trends To Watch In 2022 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Metaverse is a collective virtual universe that combines virtual worlds, augmented reality, and the internet. The virtual universe, also known as the metaverse, is a vast digital space that experts believe will eventually replace the internet. People can buy property in this world, make NFT exhibits, sell the digital content they create, or play games designed specifically for this virtual world while wearing VR glasses.

The popularity of the Metaverse is increasing, especially with the aid of numerous significant companies, such as Facebook. One of the most divisive investment topics in the future is expected to be metaverse projects.

Top 3 Metaverse Trends To Watch In 2022

Augmented and Virtual Reality in Gaming

Virtual gaming relies heavily on 3D technology, AR and VR assemblies, and sonic systems. These technologies have experienced exponential growth as this market has grown, increasing their value and market relevance. The market for AR and VR headsets increased by 60.8% in 2021. However, according to the International Data Corporation’s (IDC) Quarterly AR/VR Headset Tracker, the APAC region alone shipped 2.19 million units. The gaming industry undergoes new revolutions thanks to these technologies.

Metaverse Events

Fortnite concerts Online have drawn in 10.7M users. Live events and advertisements in the Metaverse could cost up to US$800 billion. In 2024, the global market for video game software and hardware could reach $400 billion, with the remaining opportunities coming from live entertainment and social media. Over 75,000 sales for a total of almost US$25 million have been made of the Decentraland pieces of land, NFT tokens, and virtual land plots in the Decentraland Metaverse. Future concerts will be completely altered by this trend.

The complexity of Metaverse Avatars

Avatars are likely to become more advanced, according to metaverse trends. Avatars currently come in a wide variety of shapes. This includes photorealistic forms that almost exactly resemble people in the real world as well as 2D avatars.

The advanced, almost photorealistic avatars offered by Meta are well known. Over time, more and more of the company’s products will support these avatars. Microsoft, meanwhile, focuses on using AI technology to make avatars. However,  that blends in with a business setting thanks to responsive animation. It is simple to create avatars and export them into various metaverse implementations thanks to well-known apps like Zepeto and OSUVOX.

Also Read: Top 5 Metaverse Blockchain Projects To Lookout For In 2022; Here’s A-List

The post Year Ender: Top 3 Metaverse Trends To Watch In 2022 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Elon Musk Says Twitter Was Tracking To Spend $5Bln Next Year
item.dc:creator: Jai Pratap

item.title: Breaking: RBI Governer Warns Crypto Will Cause Next Financial Crisis
item.dc:creator: Divya Sinha

item.title: Breaking: RBI Chief Reaffirms Crypto Ban, Warns Of Upcoming Financial Crisis
item.dc:creator: Ashish Kumar
item.description:
Crypto News: The Indian government and watchdogs have been skeptical over the use and implementation of private digital assets in the nation. Authorities have already implied a 30% tax on the capital gains earned from crypto trading in India. However, the Indian Central Bank governor has issued a warning regarding the next financial crisis. RBI

The post Breaking: RBI Chief Reaffirms Crypto Ban, Warns Of Upcoming Financial Crisis appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto News: The Indian government and watchdogs have been skeptical over the use and implementation of private digital assets in the nation. Authorities have already implied a 30% tax on the capital gains earned from crypto trading in India. However, the Indian Central Bank governor has issued a warning regarding the next financial crisis.

RBI Chief warns of a financial crisis

In the BFSI insight Summit, Shaktikanta Das, RBI Governor talked about the recent collapse and developments in the crypto industry. However, he warned of the next possible financial crisis and mentioned that it will come from private digital assets.

Das further asserted that he still holds the same view regarding that digital assets and wants them to be prohibited. Meanwhile, he also added that the crypto has no underlying value. Private Digital assets are major risks for macroeconomic and Financial Stability.

RBI Chief mentioned the recent decline in the crypto market highlighting the major FTX collapse. These episodes have proved to be a major supporter of the Indian authorities’ stand against crypto. However, Das stated that a change in the value of any product is a function of the market.

Crypto origin is to bypass the system

RBI Chief stated that the origin of cryptocurrency is to bypass and break the system. Meanwhile, Das argued that he is yet to hear any credible argument of what public good crypto serves. There is no clarity about it. He marked the crypto as speculative activity and it should be prohibited.

Earlier, Coingape reported that the RBI launched the pilot phase of Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC)/ Retail digital Rupee on December 1, 2022. The watchdog will be testing the settlement of secondary market transactions.

Meanwhile, the Indian government has faced heavy criticism from citizens for imposing high taxes rate on retail crypto trade.

The post Breaking: RBI Chief Reaffirms Crypto Ban, Warns Of Upcoming Financial Crisis appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Solana Will Be Worth If SOL Reaches $100
item.dc:creator: Dhirendra Kumar
item.description:
One of the major casualties of the recent FTX-Alameda crash is Solana (SOL). Since Solana Foundation had close relationships with FTX and SBF‘s other companies, it took the fall for the crisis. Solana prices slumped to a record low of $13 (on November 11), days after the news of the FTX liquidity crisis crippled the

The post Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Solana Will Be Worth If SOL Reaches $100 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
One of the major casualties of the recent FTX-Alameda crash is Solana (SOL). Since Solana Foundation had close relationships with FTX and SBF‘s other companies, it took the fall for the crisis.

Solana prices slumped to a record low of $13 (on November 11), days after the news of the FTX liquidity crisis crippled the market. Since then, SOL has struggled to recover.

The price of Solana hit an all-time high of $260.06 during the bull run of 2021 (on Nov. 6). SOL prices have been declining ever since and are currently trading at $12.08.

SOL’s Future Prospects

According to several cryptocurrency analysts, it could be challenging for SOL to return to its all-time high ($260) because Solana’s fully diluted valuation (FDV) of $100 billion was never justified.

According to cryptopredictions.com, SOL can breach the $40 barrier by 2026.

Given that the value proposition offered by the Solana ecosystem remains more or less the same (despite market sentiments not being in favour of Solana, which is one of the main reasons behind its price crash), it is very likely that SOL will touch the $100 mark in the next bull run.

Since SOL is in a dip, if you can hold it for the long term, that is, until the next bull run hits and market sentiments are in favour of Solana, you can make decent money from this investment.

Also Read: Interested In Altcoins? Here Are 3 That Could Boost Your Portfolio In Ongoing Bear Market

How Much Money You Would Make if Solana (SOL) Reaches $100?

Let’s say you invest a modest $100 in SOL tokens today. This will get you 8.28 SOL tokens at the current price of $12.08. In the event that SOL hits $100, your $100 investment will become worth $828, giving you an 8x  or 728% return on investment.

Let’s assume that you buy $1000 worth of SOL tokens today. At the current rate, you will have approximately 82.78 tokens. Your $1000 investment will be worth $8278 if liquidated at the price of $100. If SOL hits the $100 mark in the next 3 years, you will get an annualised ROI of 102% on your investment.

It is important for anyone considering investing in Solana or any other cryptocurrency to carefully research the asset and understand the risks involved before making any investment decisions.

Disclaimer: This is not investment advice.

Also Read: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Cardano Will Be Worth If ADA Reaches $1

The post Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Solana Will Be Worth If SOL Reaches $100 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Year Ender : Top 5 Bollywood Celebrities Who Owned NFTs In 2022
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
NFTs are digital media representations that are securely stored as blockchain-based records and that can be purchased with cryptocurrencies. The original work is worth more than the postcard you purchased from the museum, much like the priceless nature of Matisse or Van Gogh, and the same logic applies to NFTs and their copyrights. Influencers and

The post Year Ender : Top 5 Bollywood Celebrities Who Owned NFTs In 2022 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
NFTs are digital media representations that are securely stored as blockchain-based records and that can be purchased with cryptocurrencies. The original work is worth more than the postcard you purchased from the museum, much like the priceless nature of Matisse or Van Gogh, and the same logic applies to NFTs and their copyrights.

Influencers and celebrities aren’t far behind in the NFT race. The NFT collections of well-known celebrities like Snoop Dogg, Paris Hilton, Eminem, Bella Hadid, etc. have been released for their fans. The way we think about ownership and digital marketing has changed as a result of NFTs. Unsurprisingly, the NFT industry has been growing faster than ever, and the non-fungible tokens craze hasn’t spared Indian celebrities.

Top 5 Bollywood celebrities who owned NFTs in 2022

Amitabh Bachchan

 

 

The renowned Bollywood actor Amitabh Bachchan joined the NFT movement in November 2021. In addition to autographed Sholay posters and other items related to the movie, he also launched Madhushala, his father’s celebrated poetry recital. Through an NFT marketplace, the collection was auctioned off for Rs. 7.18 crores.

Salman Khan

 

 

The Wanted actor debuted his NFT line, which was inspired by his film Dabangg. A total of 200 NFTs, 42 of which were movie scenes, were part of the NFT series he started. Salman Khan announced his NFT series on Twitter on December 25, 2021, and the collection launched on December 30, 2021. Fans could use ETH or MATIC tokens to purchase NFTs.

Rajnikant

 

The Thalaiva of the south Indian film industry, Rajinikanth, is also involved with NFTs. He launched his collection in July 2021 in collaboration with the Singapore-based non-fungible token marketplace Diginoor.io. However, his 2007 film Sivaji: The Boss was featured in his non-fungible token collection. On Diginoor.io, customers could use a debit card or a cryptocurrency of their choice to buy their favorite movie moments.

Sunny Leone

 

 

Sunny Leone debuts her own non-fungible token collection, Misfitz, making her the first Indian actress to do so. Unusual patterns, boisterous characters, and an eclectic atmosphere characterized the collection. However, in November 2021, the collection, which contained about 9600 non-fungible tokens, quickly ran out of stock.

Manish Malhotra

 

 

 

Manish Malhotra, a famous fashion designer in India, is the first in his profession to enter this market. He unveiled five exclusive sketches and runway GIFs of his clothing in October 2021. However, Lisa Ray, Deepika Padukone, Kareena Kapoor Khan, and Alia Bhatt wore.

However, when the auction went live on the WazirX, it was completely sold out. The Illuminous Showstopper, a famously worn outfit by Kareena Kapoor Khan, generated the highest payment of 3,000 WRX, or roughly USD $4,000. (almost Rs 2.8 lakh).

Also Read: Manish Malhotra Fashion NFT Lehengas: A Glimpse

The post Year Ender : Top 5 Bollywood Celebrities Who Owned NFTs In 2022 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Price Today: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) Trading In Green; Dogecoin (DOGE), Cardano (ADA) Slips
item.dc:creator: Shourya Jha
item.description:
Cryptocurrency Price Today: The crypto price has fallen yet again after seeing a day of optimism. Although Bitcoin and Ethereum are up by a slight percentage, the other major coins plummeted. Bitcoin sees a rise of 0.30% and Ethereum is up by 0.24%. Dogecoin has dipped by 2.94% in the last 24 hours. Cardano is

The post Cryptocurrency Price Today: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) Trading In Green; Dogecoin (DOGE), Cardano (ADA) Slips appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Cryptocurrency Price Today: The crypto price has fallen yet again after seeing a day of optimism. Although Bitcoin and Ethereum are up by a slight percentage, the other major coins plummeted.

Bitcoin sees a rise of 0.30% and Ethereum is up by 0.24%.

Dogecoin has dipped by 2.94% in the last 24 hours. Cardano is down by 2.20%.

XDC Network is the highest gainer in the last 24 hours with a jump of 6.64%. Chain is the biggest loser with a drop of 3.03%.

The global crypto market cap is down by 0.03% and stands at 809.91 billion USD. The total crypto market volume is down by 11.33% in the last 24 hours and stands at 32.49 billion USD.

The top 4 most impacted crypto for today are:

Cronos (CRO) is up by 1.58%

With a jump of 1.58%, Cronos stands as one of the biggest gainers in the last 24 hours. It has a market cap of 1.197 billion USD. Trading volume is seeing a rise of 24.28%. Each CRO token is costing 0.05715 USD. Source: coinmarketcap

Bitcoin (BTC) is up by 0.30%

With a slight rise of 0.30% in the last 24 hours, the market cap for crypto Bitcoin is 324.396 billion USD. Trading volume is up by 0.29%. Bitcoin’s dominance has seen an increase of 0.13% over the past day. Each BTC token is selling for 16,847.37 USD. Source: coinmarketcap

Dogecoin (DOGE) is down by 2.94%

Meme crypto, Dogecoin is seeing a drop of 2.94% in the last 24 hours and the market cap stands at 9.380 billion USD. Each DOGE token is at 0.0726 USD. Trading volume is seeing a downfall of 33.26% compared to the last day. Source: coinmarketcap

Cardano (ADA) is down by 2.20%

The market cap of Cardano stands at 11.828 billion USD, a plunge of 2.20% in the last 24 hours. Trading volume is also down by 23.75%. Each ADA token is currently for 0.2512 USD. Source: coinmarketcap

Conclusion

Cryptocurrency Price Today: The market is still bearish as there is no high jump and nit for even two consecutive days the charts are completely green. We are very near to the end of this year but the bullish momentum seems really far.

The post Cryptocurrency Price Today: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) Trading In Green; Dogecoin (DOGE), Cardano (ADA) Slips appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Filecoin Will Be Worth If FIL Reaches $10
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
Filecoin (FIL) is a cryptocurrency that powers the Filecoin network, a decentralized peer-to-peer file storage network that aims to allow anyone to store, retrieve, and host digital information. FIL tokens are used as payment for these services as well as a financial incentive to guarantee that files are consistently stored over time. As a proof-of-work

The post Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Filecoin Will Be Worth If FIL Reaches $10 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Filecoin (FIL) is a cryptocurrency that powers the Filecoin network, a decentralized peer-to-peer file storage network that aims to allow anyone to store, retrieve, and host digital information. FIL tokens are used as payment for these services as well as a financial incentive to guarantee that files are consistently stored over time.

As a proof-of-work token, FIL allows the Filecoin community to mine and receive additional coins as payment. Additionally, FIL can be used on the Filecoin network, where users can pay miners to store or retrieve their data. In the event that there are no or insufficient proofs, the token may also be used as collateral.

Filecoin (FIL) Price Analysis

Filecoin’s price today is $2.93, with a market capitalization of $1B and a 24-hour trading volume down by 4.62%. Now it stands at $127 million. At the same time, the circulating supply is approximately 344,966,605 FIL.

 

Source: Coinmarketcap

Despite the negative market trends, the technical analysis of the Filecoin price shows a significant surge fueled by FIL growth. The Filecoin (FIL) price has increased significantly in comparison to counterparts such as Stellar and Ethereum.

Also Read: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment In Chainlink Will Be Worth If LINK Reaches $10

How Much Money Would You Make If FIL Reaches $10?

According to Cryptopredictions.com, FIL can go as high as $10.9 by December 2025. Let’s assume that you invest a modest $100 in Filecoin today.

According to today’s price, which is $2.92, you will have approximately 34.26 FIL. If Filecoin’s price hits $10 in the next few years, your $100 will become approximately $342.6. Let’s say you bought $100 worth of FIL coins today. With the current rate, you will have approximately 34.26 coins. However, you can potentially make $342 when it reaches the $100 mark.

Disclaimer: This is not investment advice. Please do your due diligence before investing in any asset.

Also Read: Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Polkadot Will Be Worth If DOT Reaches $10

The post Here’s How Much Your $100 Investment in Filecoin Will Be Worth If FIL Reaches $10 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Crypto Twitter Reacts To Core Scientific Filing For Chapter 11 Bankruptcy
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Core Scientific is filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in Texas on Wednesday, December 21. It is one of the largest publicly listed crypto mining companies in the U.S. Core Scientific has decided to file for bankruptcy due to falling crypto prices and rising energy prices that deteriorated its finances. Despite the $72 million in

The post Breaking: Crypto Twitter Reacts To Core Scientific Filing For Chapter 11 Bankruptcy appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Core Scientific is filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in Texas on Wednesday, December 21. It is one of the largest publicly listed crypto mining companies in the U.S. Core Scientific has decided to file for bankruptcy due to falling crypto prices and rising energy prices that deteriorated its finances.

Despite the $72 million in financing from its lender B. Riley last week to avoid bankruptcy, the crypto miner was unable to work efficiently and will work on restructuring, reported CNBC. Core Scientific plans to keep mining until it restructures its balance sheet.

Core Scientific’s market cap dropped to $78 million on Tuesday, down from a $4.3 billion valuation in July 2021 when it went public. The CORZ stock price has fallen more than 98% in the last year. On Tuesday, the stock price ended at $0.21, up 3.07%.

According to a person familiar with the company’s situation, the company is still generating positive cash flow. However, cash is insufficient to repay the financing debt owed on mining equipment it was leasing. Core Scientific will not liquidate and operate normally until reaching a deal with senior security noteholders, which hold the majority of the company’s debt.

Crypto Twitter Reactions To Core Scientific Bankruptcy

Crypto influencers took to Twitter to report Core Scientific’s bankruptcy filing. Many crypto miners are facing financial constraints amid the bear market.

Crypto researcher Dylan Leclair reported that the firm owns approximately 5% of the global hash rate. He also shared the situation of listed crypto miners with many having stock prices down over 90% in 2022.

Crypto investor and board member at Iris Energy Mike Alfred said Core Scientific had told him that the company would have 13 EH by July of this year when he first looked at the company in the summer of 2021.

Many people showed concerns over the future of bitcoin mining as several crypto miners such as Argo Blockchain and Iris Energy are facing bankruptcy risks.

Also Read: Bitcoin Price Prediction for 2023

The post Breaking: Crypto Twitter Reacts To Core Scientific Filing For Chapter 11 Bankruptcy appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Bitcoin Mining Giant Core Scientific Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Core Scientific, the world’s largest publicly-traded crypto miner based out of the United States is ultimately filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Texas on Wednesday morning. Core Scientific joins the list of other crypto miners who have succumbed to the crash in the crypto space and the soaring energy prices. A month ago, the Bitcoin

The post Bitcoin Mining Giant Core Scientific Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Core Scientific, the world’s largest publicly-traded crypto miner based out of the United States is ultimately filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Texas on Wednesday morning.

Core Scientific joins the list of other crypto miners who have succumbed to the crash in the crypto space and the soaring energy prices. A month ago, the Bitcoin miner had already hinted about extreme pain in its operations and cash crunch owing to the market conditions.

Core Scientific was mining some proof-of-work digital assets such as Bitcoin. As we know, this requires high-end machinery and hardware while also consuming massive electricity in the process. Over the last year, the price of Core Scientific (NASDAQ: CORZ) stock has tanked by 99% losing more than $4 billion in valuations.

Last year in July 2021, the Bitcoin miner had gone for a public listing via a special purpose acquisition vehicle or SPAC. Although the company still generates a positive cash flow, it’s not enough to repay the financial debt on equipment, said sources familiar with the matter.

Core Scientific’s Further Action Plan

The sources also added that core Scientific is not willing to liquidate, however, it would continue to operate normally while reaching a deal with senior security noteholders, who hold a majority of the company’s debt.

In their filing earlier in October, Core Scientific said that holders of their common stock might suffer a total loss on their investment. However, the Bitcoin miner’s deal with its convertible note holders is such that if the market conditions for Bitcoin improve, common equity holders might not get totally wiped out.

Core Scientific has operations currently in North Dakota, North Carolina, Georgia, and Kentucky. It is also one of the largest providers of blockchain infrastructure and hosting.

Core Scientific is not the only Bitcoin miner to face bankruptcy. Compute North, the hosting infrastructure for crypto mining also filed for bankruptcy in September.

The post Bitcoin Mining Giant Core Scientific Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: FTX’s SBF Signs Extradition Paper, Will Fly to US on Wednesday
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried has finally decided to drop his fight against extradition to the United States. As per the latest report from ABC News, SBF who’s currently in the Fox Hill jail of The Bahamas has agreed to his extradition to the US on multiple charges. Reports suggest that SBF has signed his

The post FTX’s SBF Signs Extradition Paper, Will Fly to US on Wednesday appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried has finally decided to drop his fight against extradition to the United States. As per the latest report from ABC News, SBF who’s currently in the Fox Hill jail of The Bahamas has agreed to his extradition to the US on multiple charges.

Reports suggest that SBF has signed his extradition paper and a hearing for the same will happen on Wednesday in Nassau. The development has been confirmed by Bahamas Acting Commissioner of Corrections Doan Cleare.

After signing his surrender documents on Tuesday, the Bahamas Commissioner said that SBF will sign a separate set of papers and finalize his waiver of rights to fight extradition.

Interestingly, the Federal authorities are looking to fly back SBF to the U.S. soon after Wednesday’s hearing. The Bloomberg report notes that the disgraced FTX founder will be accompanied to the US by FBI agents in a non-commercial aircraft. Another source familiar with the matter said that the plane will leave from a private airport in The Bahamas.

Not A Good Christmas for SBF

Sam Bankman Fried has been facing severe charges over the misuse of customers’ funds at FTX which led to a dramatic collapse of a $32 billion company. Some previous reports suggest that SBF might face 115 years of prison which is equivalent to life imprisonment.

After getting earlier this month, the Bahamian court also denied bail to SBF last week. Since then, he’s been placed in one of the most notorious jail facilities of the island nation i.e. Fox Hill.

On Wednesday, the Bahamian authorities will escort Sam Bankman-Fried from the prison to the court. Although initially hesitant, SBF has agreed to the extradition to the U.S. This change in attitude might be partly due to the expectation that SBF could get bail in the US. So far, it isn’t clear where SBF is planning to land on Wednesday.

The post FTX’s SBF Signs Extradition Paper, Will Fly to US on Wednesday appeared first on CoinGape.
